# Packages

## Big Frameworks

- https://github.com/SciML/DifferentialEquations.jl : high-performance solvers for differential equations.
- https://github.com/SciML/ModelingToolkit.jl : a modeling framework for high-performance symbolic-numeric computation in scientific computing and scientific machine learning
- https://github.com/SciML/Catalyst.jl : a symbolic modeling package for analysis and high performance simulation of chemical reaction networks.
- https://github.com/SciML/Optimization.jl : Mathematical Optimization in Julia with a unified interface.
- https://github.com/JuliaDynamics/Agents.jl : Agent-based modeling framework in Julia.

## Parameter estimation

- https://github.com/SciML/DiffEqParamEstim.jl : Easy scientific machine learning (SciML) parameter estimation with pre-built loss functions (`build_loss_objective()`).
- https://github.com/sebapersson/PEtab.jl : Create parameter estimation problems for ODE models.

## Arrays

- https://github.com/SciML/RecursiveArrayTools.jl : Handling nesting arrays (arrays of arrays).
- https://github.com/SciML/ComponentArrays.jl : Arrays with arbitrarily nested named components.

## File IO

- https://github.com/JuliaData/DataFrames.jl : In-memory tabular data in Julia.
- https://github.com/JuliaIO/JLD2.jl : Saves and loads Julia objects in the HDF5 format.
- https://github.com/JuliaData/CSV.jl : Saves and load data in the `csv` format.

## Misc

- https://github.com/JuliaSymbolics/Symbolics.jl : A symbolic calculation package used by `ModelingToolkit.jl`.
- https://github.com/SciML/NonlinearSolve.jl : Nonlinear solvers.
